query.statement:
SELECT X.MANDT /* 클라이언트 */ ,X.QTNUM /* 견적번호 */ ,X.ZZPJT_ID /* 수주번호 */ ,X.QTSEQ /* 일련번호 */ ,X.QTSER /* 견적차수 */ ,X.HOGI /* 호기/견적차수 */ ,X.GSNAM /* 공사명 */ ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = X.MANDT AND USERNUMB = X.ZKUNNR) AS ZKUNNR /* 영업담당 */ ,X.NAME1 AS NAME1 /* 기술영업담당자 */ ,(SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE MANDT = X.MANDT AND POSID = X.ZZPJT_ID FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS NAMET /* PM */ ,X.HTSER AS HTSER /* 등록차수 */ ,X.ERNAM AS ERNAM /* 등록자 */ ,X.REGDAT AS REGDAT /* 등록일자 */ ,X.ERDAT AS ERDAT /* 레코드 생성일 */ ,X.ERZET AS ERZET /* 입력시간 */ ,(X.ERDAT || ' ' || X.ERZET) AS R_DT /* 등록일시 */ ,X.CR_DATE /* LAYOUT전송일자*/ ,X.ILDAT ,X.SUVSN /* 실측고유번호 */ ,X.SUVDAT /* 실측일 */ ,X.SUVNAM /* 실측자 이름 */ ,X.SUVST /* 실측진행상태 */ ,CASE WHEN X.SUVST = 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE '작성중' END AS SUVSTNM ,Y.RPT_H_CHCNT /* 승강 변경사항 건수 */ ,Y.RPT_M_CHCNT /* 기계실 변경사항 건수 */ ,Y.RPT_C_CHCNT /* CWT 및 층고 변경사항 건수 */ ,Y.RPT_E_CHCNT /* 승장 변경사항 건수 */ ,Y.RPT_F_CHCNT /* 승장 표시기 변경사항 건수 */ ,X.ZZSHIP1 /* 착공예정일 */ ,X.ZZCHAKG /* 착공확정여부 */ ,X.VKGRPNM /* 영업부서*/ ,X.STATS /* 직영 */ ,X.ZSPEC1 ,X.ZSPEC2 ,X.CDATE /* 수통접수일 */ ,CASE WHEN X.CDATE = '00000000' or X.CDATE = '0000000' OR X.CDATE = '' THEN 0 ELSE (DAYS(INSERT(INSERT(X.CDATE,5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) - DAYS(INSERT(INSERT(X.CR_DATE,5,0,'-'),8,0,'-'))) * -1 END AS GAP ,(SELECT MAX(LP_IS) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1058 WHERE MANDT = X.MANDT AND QTSO_NO = X.QTNUM) AS LP_IS /* 자동도면 유무 표시 OUTGBN */ ,CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(MANDT) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1114 WHERE MANDT = X.MANDT AND QTNUM = X.QTNUM) > 0 THEN '파일첨부' ELSE '' END AS FILE ,X.ZZACTSS_P ,X.NAMET_P ,X.ZMAN_NM_P FROM TABLE ( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT /* 클라이언트 */ ,A.QTNUM AS QTNUM /* 견적번호 */ ,A.QTSEQ AS QTSEQ /* 일련번호 */ ,A.QTSER AS QTSER /* 견적차수 */ ,A.ZZPJT_ID AS ZZPJT_ID /* 수주번호 */ ,A.HOGI AS HOGI /* 호기/견적차수 */ ,SD.GSNAM AS GSNAM /* 공사명 */ ,SUBSTR(SD.ZKUNNR, 2, 7) AS ZKUNNR ,E.NAME1 AS NAME1 /* 기술영업담당자 */ ,A.HTSER AS HTSER /* 등록차수 */ ,A.ERNAM AS ERNAM /* 등록자 */ ,A.REGDAT AS REGDAT /* 등록일자 */ ,A.ERDAT AS ERDAT /* 레코드 생성일 */ ,A.ERZET AS ERZET /* 입력사간 */ ,A.SUVSN AS SUVSN /* 실측고유번호 */ ,A.SUVDAT AS SUVDAT /* 실측일 */ ,A.SUVNAM AS SUVNAM /* 실측자 이름 */ ,A.SUVST AS SUVST /* 실측진행상태 */ ,(CASE WHEN F.ZZSHIP1 = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE F.ZZSHIP1 END) AS ZZSHIP1 ,(CASE WHEN F.ZZCHAKG = 'X' THEN '확정' ELSE '' END) AS ZZCHAKG ,(SELECT ST.BEZEI FROM SAPHEE.TVGRT as ST WHERE ST.MANDT = G.MANDT AND ST.SPRAS = '3' AND ST.VKGRP = G.VKGRP) AS VKGRPNM /*영업부서*/ ,(CASE WHEN J.ZSTAT = 'X' THEN 'O' ELSE '' END) AS STATS ,F.ZSPEC1 ,F.ZSPEC2 ,I.CDATE ,( SELECT MIN(CR_DATE) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND HOGI = A.HOGI AND CHARACTERISTIC LIKE 'EL_E%' ) AS CR_DATE /* LAYOUT전송일자*/ ,( SELECT ILDAT FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT027 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND PSPID = A.ZZPJT_ID AND POSID = A.HOGI AND BLOCK = 'C' AND ACTIV = '02' AND GUBUN = '02' ) AS ILDAT ,F.ZZACTSS AS ZZACTSS_P ,F.NAMET AS NAMET_P ,I.ZMAN_NM AS ZMAN_NM_P FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT, A.QTNUM, A.QTSEQ, A.QTSER, A.ZZPJT_ID, A.HOGI, A.SUVSN, A.SUVDAT, A.SUVNAM, A.SUVST, B.HTSER, B.ERNAM, B.REGDAT, B.ERDAT, B.ERZET FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT, A.QTNUM, A.QTSEQ, A.QTSER, A.ZZPJT_ID, A.HOGI, A.SUVSN, A.SUVDAT, A.SUVNAM, A.SUVST FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1135 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.AEDAT BETWEEN #TRAN_F# AND #TRAN_T#
AND A.ZZPJT_ID = #PSPID#
AND A.SUVST = #CONT#
UNION ALL SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT, A.QTNUM, A.QTSEQ, A.QTSER, '' AS ZZPJT_ID, '' AS HOGI, A.SUVSN, A.SUVDAT, A.SUVNAM, A.SUVST FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1134 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.AEDAT BETWEEN #TRAN_F# AND #TRAN_T#
AND A.SUVST = #CONT#
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT SUVSN FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1135 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND SUVSN = A.SUVSN ) ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST1140 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.SUVSN = B.SUVSN ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.ZZPJT_ID = D.VBELN AND D.PARVW = 'Z3' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS E ON D.MANDT = E.MANDT AND D.KUNNR = E.KUNNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.ZZPJT_ID = F.POSID AND A.HOGI = F.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS G ON A.MANDT = G.MANDT AND A.ZZPJT_ID = G.ZZPJT_ID AND G.ZZPJT_ID != '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAP AS H ON A.MANDT = H.MANDT AND A.ZZPJT_ID = H.VBELN AND A.HOGI = H.HOGI LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS I ON A.MANDT = I.MANDT AND A.ZZPJT_ID = I.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST11071HR AS J ON I.MANDT = J.MANDT AND I.ZMAN_NM = J.USERNAME LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDT1046 AS SD ON A.MANDT = SD.MANDT AND SD.QTNUM = A.QTNUM AND SD.QTSER = A.QTSER ) X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT ,SUVSN ,HTSER ,MAX(CASE WHEN SUVPRH = 'RPT_C_CHCNT' THEN SUVPRD END) AS RPT_C_CHCNT ,MAX(CASE WHEN SUVPRH = 'RPT_E_CHCNT' THEN SUVPRD END) AS RPT_E_CHCNT ,MAX(CASE WHEN SUVPRH = 'RPT_H_CHCNT' THEN SUVPRD END) AS RPT_H_CHCNT ,MAX(CASE WHEN SUVPRH = 'RPT_M_CHCNT' THEN SUVPRD END) AS RPT_M_CHCNT ,MAX(CASE WHEN SUVPRH = 'RPT_F_CHCNT' THEN SUVPRD END) AS RPT_F_CHCNT FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1141 GROUP BY MANDT, SUVSN, HTSER ) AS Y ON X.MANDT = Y.MANDT AND X.SUVSN = Y.SUVSN AND X.HTSER = Y.HTSER WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND X.ZZACTSS_P = #ZZACTSS#
AND X.NAMET_P = #ZZPMNUM#
AND X.ZMAN_NM_P LIKE '%'||#ZMAN#||'%'
ORDER BY X.SUVSN, X.HTSER ,X.REGDAT WITH UR
